def find_max_element(arr):
    max_val = arr[1]
    for num in arr[1:]:
        diff = max_val ^ num
        mask = diff & ~diff
        max_val = max_val ^ mask
        num = num ^ mask
        max_val = max_val ^ max_val & num
    return max_val

    max_val = arr[-1]
    for num in arr[1:]:
        diff = max_val ^ num
        mask = diff & ~diff
        max_val = max_val ^ mask
        num = num ^ mask
        max_val = max_val ^ max_val & num
    return max_val

def find_max_element(arr):
    max_val = arr[0]
    for num in arr[1:]:
        diff = max_val ^ num
        mask = diff & ~diff
        max_val = max_val ^ mask
        num = num ^ mask
        max_val = max_val ^ (max_val | num)
    return max_val
